mapper.insert:
select product_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product(pnum,upcg_code,downcg_code,pname, pimage1,pimage2,pimage3, price, saleprice, pqty,point,pspec,pcontents,pcompany,pindate) values(#{pnum},#{upCg_code},#{downCg_code},#{pname}, #{pimage1:VARCHAR},#{pimage2:VARCHAR},#{pimage3:VARCHAR},#{price},#{saleprice},#{pqty}, #{point},#{pspec},#{pcontents},#{pcompany},sysdate)
mapper.select: select p.*, (select upCg_name from upCategory where upCg_code=p.upCg_code) upCg_name, (select downCg_name from downCategory where downCg_code=p.downCg_code) downCg_name from product p order by pnum desc
